item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Laurel Thatcher Ulrich
item.description: "Well-behaved women seldom make history." -- Laurel Thatcher Ulrich

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Winston Churchill
item.description: "You have enemies? Good. That means you've stood up for something, sometime in your life." -- Winston Churchill

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Robert Asprin
item.description: "In times of crisis, it is of the utmost importance that one does not lose her head. Marie Antoinette" -- Robert Asprin

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Robert Lynn Asprin
item.description: "To function efficiently, any group of people or employees must have faith in their leader."- Capt. Bligh(ret.)" -- Robert Lynn Asprin

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Robert Lynn Asprin
item.description: "Numerical superiority is of no consequence. In battle, victory will go to the best tactician."- G. A. Custer" -- Robert Lynn Asprin

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Robert Lynn Asprin
item.description: "Diplomacy is the delicate weapon of the civilized warrior."- Hun, A. T." -- Robert Lynn Asprin

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Robert Lynn Asprin
item.description: "When old friends get together, everything else fades to insignificance."- War, Famine, Pestilence, and Death" -- Robert Lynn Asprin

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Robert Lynn Asprin
item.description: "We've got an unbeatable team."- Sauron" -- Robert Lynn Asprin

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Robert Lynn Asprin
item.description: "My colleagues and I feel that independents like ElfQuest are nothing but sheep in wolves' clothing."- S. Lee" -- Robert Lynn Asprin

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Robert Lynn Asprin
item.description: "Everybody needs a career manager."- Lady Macbeth" -- Robert Lynn Asprin

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Robert Lynn Asprin
item.description: "They never let you live it down. One little mistake!"- Nero" -- Robert Lynn Asprin

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Robert Lynn Asprin
item.description: "Just a little off the top!"- A. Boleyn" -- Robert Lynn Asprin

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Robert Lynn Asprin
item.description: "To Serve and Protect..."- Traditional Motto of Protection Rackets" -- Robert Lynn Asprin

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Robert Lynn Asprin
item.description: "Blessed are the peacemakers, for they shall take flack from both sides."- Unofficial UN Motto" -- Robert Lynn Asprin

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Robert Lynn Asprin
item.description: "Meanwhile, back at reality..."- G.Lucas" -- Robert Lynn Asprin

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Robert Lynn Asprin
item.description: "Don't pick up hitchhikers!"- D. Adams" -- Robert Lynn Asprin

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Robert Lynn Asprin
item.description: "There's gotta be a way out of this dungeon."- G. Gygax" -- Robert Lynn Asprin

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Robert McKee
item.description: "When talented people write badly, it's generally for one of two reasons: Either they're blinded by an idea they feel compelled to prove of they're driven by an emotion they must express. When talented people write well, it is generally for this reason: They're moved by a desire to touch the audience." -- Robert McKee

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Isaac Asimov
item.description: "The most exciting phrase to hear in science, the one that heralds the most discoveries, is not "Eureka!" (I found it!) but 'That's funny..." -- Isaac Asimov

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Diane Frolov and Andrew Schneider
item.description: "Sometimes the mind, for reasons we don't necessarily understand, just decides to go to the store for a quart of milk." -- Diane Frolov and Andrew Schneider

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Carl Sagan
item.description: "The universe is a pretty big place. If it's just us, seems like an awful waste of space." -- Carl Sagan

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Always acknowledge a fault. This will throw those in authority off their guard and give you an opportunity to commit more." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Dr. David M. Burns
item.description: "Assert your right to make a few mistakes. If people can't accept your imperfections, that's their fault." -- Dr. David M. Burns

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Adlai E. Stevenson
item.description: "My definition of a free society is a society where it is safe to be unpopular." -- Adlai E. Stevenson

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by John Wayne
item.description: "Courage is being scared to death, but saddling up anyway." -- John Wayne

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by George Washington
item.description: "Be courteous to all, but intimate with few, and let those few be well tried before you give them your confidence. True friendship is a plant of slow growth, and must undergo and withstand the shocks of adversity before it is entitled to appellation. " -- George Washington

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Sam Levenson
item.description: "For Attractive lips, speak words of kindness. &emsp;For lovely eyes, seek out the good in people. &emsp;For a slim figure, share your food with the hungry. &emsp;For beautiful hair, let a child run their fingers through it once a day. &emsp;For poise, walk with the knowledge that you never walk alone. &emsp;People, more than things, have to be restored, renewed, revived, reclaimed, and redeemed. Remember, if you ever need a helping hand, you will find one at the end of each of your arms. &emsp;As you grow older, you will discover that you have two hands, one for helping yourself and the other for helping others." -- Sam Levenson

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Jimi Hendrix
item.description: "Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens" -- Jimi Hendrix

item.title: Rebecca add a quote by Theodore Roethke
item.description: "What we need are more people who specialize in the impossible." -- Theodore Roethke
